title: Jpatch.exe spam

replies.body: I also have this exact same issue, and the client repair tool does not fix the issue.

Hey there White Lion,

If you're able to access the patcher could you please run a repair on your client, see [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) guide for steps on how to repair your install.
